page.title: 10Wildlife on the Marshes.
page.content: There is an abundance of wildlife on the{Manxey Levels. Foxes}roam around the area - often raiding farms.{ {Rabbits}are plentiful.{Brown rats}live along the edges of the streams along with{Bank Voles.}The wet areas are also home for{Marsh}and{Common Frogs. {Mink}have become a pest in the area - more plentiful than{Ferrets}and{ {Weasels}which are also common. Some of the children in our school keep their own{Ferrets}and some boys even have{ {Polecats}but we have not heard of any wild ones on the{Marshes.}
